title: Chome + Loading Screen = Cannot connect?
body:
100% Chrome and League going into loading screen causing this error. Why though? 

Always give a cannot connect error.

replies.body: I'm confused about the issue you're experiencing?  Which loading screen are you referring to, for the game after champion select?  Let me know exactly what you're seeing and when, along with the specific error message.  I'm happy to help!

When chrome is open, normally on a stream, it tends to say that it cannot connect. Also happens with steam although the error used to be nvidea backend. I know this due to it being the processes I have to end to allow the "retry" button to work.

So right after champ select.
